column5: Dear fellow members,  May I know which lake you think would hold the biggest sized muskies? Any hint?  Balsam Lake  Cameron Lake  Sturgeon Lake  Pigeon Lake  Buckhorn Lake  I have never been to any of these lakes and would love to try them over this year with my father and my gf.  Thanks for your opinion.
I find that Balsam doesnt produce great numbers, but produces great size 'skies
i also agree with addy79 my vote would be Balsam too. one of the largest lakes in the Kawartha's happy fishing,see you on the water, walleyedreamer.
